name: cc-local-marketplace
description: Local marketplace for Claude Code plugins

plugins.name: stackey-backend

plugins.name: swift-project-tools
plugins.description: Skills for setting up and extending Swift Project Tools in iOS/Swift projects

plugins.description: Expert agents for StackeyApp (iOS/Swift), StackeyBackend (Supabase/Deno), and API contract management with cross-component coordination

plugins.name: session-manager

plugins.name: claude-usage-analyzer

plugins.name: default-tools

plugins.name: ios-agentic-loop
plugins.description: Agentic iOS testing system combining idb-driven UI exploration with Maestro deterministic regression. Provides skills for accessibility auditing, Maestro flow authoring, and autonomous idb observe-reason-act-verify loops.
